mapper.sql: posse_confirmt_id, propert_id, confirm_no, creditor_name, creditor_sign, no_code, sign_date, guarantee, guarantee_no, assets_company_name, assets_card, assets_date, legal_represen, legal_represen_date, obligor, obligor_sign, obligor_idcard, obligor_date
mapper.select: SELECT `bus_assignment_confirm`.confirm_no FROM bus_assignment_confirm ORDER BY `bus_assignment_confirm`.posse_confirmt_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT br.`data1` AS 'debtName',brp.`data1` AS 'personName',pd.`amount_this`,bg.authname,baa.assignment_agreement_no FROM bus_report br LEFT JOIN bus_relative_person brp ON br.`report_id`=brp.`report_id` LEFT JOIN bus_civil bc ON br.`report_id` = bc.report_id LEFT JOIN bus_guarantee bg ON bc.civil_id = bg.civil_id LEFT JOIN pub_debt pd ON br.`report_id` = pd.`report_id` LEFT JOIN bus_propert bp ON br.`report_id` = bp.report_id LEFT JOIN bus_assignment_agreement baa ON bp.propert_id = baa.propert_id WHERE brp.`relative_per_id` = #{relativePerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into bus_assignment_confirm (posse_confirmt_id, propert_id, confirm_no, creditor_name, creditor_sign, no_code, sign_date, guarantee, guarantee_no, assets_company_name, assets_card, assets_date, legal_represen, legal_represen_date, obligor, obligor_sign, obligor_idcard, obligor_date ) values (#{posseConfirmtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{propertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confirmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{guarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guaranteeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetsCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetsCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetsDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{legalRepresen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalRepresenDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{obligor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obligorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obligorIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obligorDate,jdbcType=DATE} )

posse_confirmt_id,
propert_id,
confirm_no,
creditor_name,
creditor_sign,

obligor_idcard,
obligor_date,

mapper.update:
update bus_assignment_confirm
propert_id = #{propertId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
confirm_no = #{confirmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creditor_name = #{creditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creditor_sign = #{creditorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
no_code = #{noCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_date = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},
guarantee = #{guarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guarantee_no = #{guaranteeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_company_name = #{assetsCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_card = #{assetsCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_date = #{assetsDate,jdbcType=DATE},
legal_represen = #{legalRepresen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_represen_date = #{legalRepresenDate,jdbcType=DATE},
obligor = #{obligor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obligor_sign = #{obligorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obligor_idcard = #{obligorIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obligor_date = #{obligorDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where posse_confirmt_id = #{posseConfirmtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bus_assignment_confirm set propert_id = #{propertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, confirm_no = #{confirmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creditor_name = #{creditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creditor_sign = #{creditorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, no_code = #{noCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_date = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE}, guarantee = #{guarantee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guarantee_no = #{guaranteeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assets_company_name = #{assetsCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assets_card = #{assetsCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assets_date = #{assetsDate,jdbcType=DATE}, legal_represen = #{legalRepresen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_represen_date = #{legalRepresenDate,jdbcType=DATE}, obligor = #{obligor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, obligor_sign = #{obligorSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, obligor_idcard = #{obligorIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, obligor_date = #{obligorDate,jdbcType=DATE} where posse_confirmt_id = #{posseConfirmtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
